title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When a new image is imported into the layout again, the image is not being refreshed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the newly imported image should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the layout.
2. Import the image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
3. Verify that the newly imported image is displayed.
4. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
5. Confirm that the newly imported image is displayed instead of the original image.
